name: R|Elan™ Cotluk
description: Presenting a smarter alternative to cotton, R|Elan™ Cotluk With a cotton-like look and feel, along with an everlasting matte appearance, it is the perfect ingredient for making high-quality knits and woven apparel across several categories. It also has excellent strength and durability.Also available is R|Elan™ GreenGold Cotluk - made from 100% used PET bottles
